Articles.Content: I am running quite a lot of mods and have them all up to date. For some reason, the Breaking Ground parts do not show up at all when KSP Interstellar Extended is running and I don't see any surface features (rock formations etc.) on any of the planets. Does the expansion only work with the vanilla game?
Are you loading a save from before you installed it?
I was. Then I created a new save and there are still no rocks or anything on the planets.

1 hour ago, Sapostropheez said:

Does the expansion only work with the vanilla game?

Not by design, no. There's probably a conflict with one of the mods.

So you don't see the robotics category in the VAB? Is the expansion being detected? Lower right corner in the main menu.

The expansion is being detected. When Interstellar is on, the category does not show up in the VAB and none of the parts show up at all. I removed Interstellar and the category and parts did show up, but the planetary surface features still do not.
